actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the House of Representatives and the Senate refrain from any consideration of legislation eliminating, reducing, or postponing cost-of-living adjustments for beneficiaries under the Social Security Act.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the House of Representatives and the Senate should refrain from any consideration of legislation eliminating, reducing, or postponing cost-of-living adjustments for social security beneficiaries.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the House of Representatives and the Senate refrain from any consideration of legislation eliminating, reducing, or postponing cost-of-living adjustments for beneficiaries under the Social Security Act.
